title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 44.2 - Scope of regulation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 44.2 - Scope of regulation

State Regulations

This Part governs any market-value adjustment formula that is applied to the actual accumulation amount under a contract or a group annuity certificate subject to section
4223
of the Insurance Law before taking into account any withdrawal charge in accordance with the provisions of section 4223. It also applies to any market-value or other adjustment of the actual accumulation amount taken as a form of withdrawal charge and limited to an amount not exceeding the maximum withdrawal charge permitted by section 4223. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
44.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
